participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending time with my grandchildren and sister, reading, and gardening.
I dyed my hair blonde and watched a game show.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
i dance ballet.

participant_2.background:
I get to show off my long fingernails.
i don t like dresses.
My family members are all very supportive of my interests and always encourage me to explore new things.
I don't want to disappoint my father.
I loved playing with my dog as a child.

content.text: How are you doing?
I'm doing well! What about you?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks!
That's great to hear! What are your hobbies?
I enjoy reading, gardening, and spending time with my family.
Those all sound like really great hobbies! I love reading too.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all sorts of books, but I'm especially a fan of historical fiction and fantasy.
Oh, me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I think it's the best way to escape from reality for a little while.
Exactly! What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I really enjoyed The Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon and the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about both of those series! I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're both really great.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
What are some of your favorite fantasy books?
I love the Lord of the Rings series by J.R.R. Tolkien and the A Song of Ice and Fire series by George R.R. Martin.
I've read both of those series too! They're both amazing.
I know, right? They're so good.
I'm so glad we have similar taste in books!
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who enjoys the same things you do.
Definitely
